body.name: Maxi-Cosi Lila Modular Stroller Duo Seat Kit, Nomad Grey, One Size
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 38 mins
features: Easily add an infant car seat or second seat for your growing family
4 modes of use for added flexibility: Maxi-Cosi Mica infant car seat (not included) + duo seat; quick-carriage + duo seat; parent-facing seat + duo seat; world-facing seat + duo seat
Max recline zips open for maximum relaxation
Easily attach second seat to stroller with connected stroller adapters
body.description: When the time is right, The Maxi-Cosi Lila modular stroller easily switches from a single to Duo stroller by adding either a Mico infant car seat or second seat. The included stroller adapters with the Duo seat kit allow for various riding configurations, accommodating both baby and toddler in a single stroller. Its an essential addition for your growing family. Add a second seat and travel together in style on every journey.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Everyone at Maxi-Cosi has one wish in common – to understand what it’s like to be a parent today. Many of us are parents too; we’ve done the sleepless nights and the first tooth. And we understand that when you’re facing another parenting challenge your baby will look you in the eye and chuckle, or hiccup, or give you a flower, or do something else that stops you completely in your tracks. Suddenly, you appreciate the absolute joy that comes with being a mum or dad. We want to maximize that joy so you can get on with enjoying these precious moments.

About Us Everyone at Maxi-Cosi has one wish in common – to understand what it’s like to be a parent today. Many of us are parents too; we’ve done the sleepless nights and the first tooth. And we understand that when you’re facing another parenting challenge your baby will look you in the eye and chuckle, or hiccup, or give you a flower, or do something else that stops you completely in your tracks. Suddenly, you appreciate the absolute joy that comes with being a mum or dad. We want to maximize that joy so you can get on with enjoying these precious moments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy With Our Decision
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I had a Maxi Cosi car-seat so we decided to give the stroller a try.I can't compare it to other expensive strollers, but I do want to address some key points that we thought were important:1) Ease of use and storage - The stroller is fairly easy to store. It collapses with one hand but is not super small when collapsed. Handles extend enough for me (6' tall)2) Wheels - The wheels are really nice and large. You can easily cross some grass/dirt crossings if necessary and it won't get hung up on roots like strollers with smaller wheels.3) Build quality - It's primarily made of aluminum and is very solid. AKA, solid construction piece and not made of many tiny parts.4) Baby comfort - The included seat is actually VERY nice. We use it when we don't need our car-seat. But it's very easy to switch back and forth between the stroller seat and the car-seat.The only thing I think is a bit flimsy is the storage basket on the bottom It's not securely attached so it kind of flops around. We still use it, but keep an eye on stuff on it while walking.I expect this stroller will outlast its required use. Which is why we didn't feel bad for paying this much for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: There is a little bit of a learning curve when installing and removing this seat from the stroller. My 2.5 year old son fits great in it and he is tall and a solid 35lbs. He loves having his own seat with a view. I will say that the stroller with the second seat is not as easy to maneuver. It is a beautiful seat tho. Exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: I have a Maxi Cosi Coral XP car seat so I am limited to which strollers I can connect with. I needed a double stroller because we are about to add baby 2. I ordered this because it is a more economically sound purchase than the vista v2. I have to say the benefit is so many of the things provided in the base purchase of the Maxi Cosi Lila is refreshing because each of those items like a snack tray and cup holder are add ons for the V2, however let me just say this as clearly as possible, you get what you pay for. The car seat adapters are warped it made it nearly impossible to get the car seat back off of the stroller. There is no way you could do it and not wake a sleeping baby. Ultimately I had to disconnect the car seat from the stroller and turn it upside down and use a screwdriver to trigger the lock release. (No the baby wasn’t in the car seat when this happened) also the shocks are awful. You can feel every single crack in the sidewalk as you stroll which makes the stroller feel wobbly. Further, I’m average height 5’5” my husband is 6’1”, either way with our differing heights we both still kicked the under part of the stroller when we would walk, which is very annoying. Lastly the storage compartment is small and flimsy. It never really took shape or firmness back. Things kept falling out of the bag as we’d go over bumps. All and all I’d say invest in something else. We ended up biting the bullet and investing in the V2 and couldn’t be any happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS STROLLER AND ITS SOOO BEAUTIFUL BUT...
reviews.reviewText: I dont like how the boot cover is super hard to push in the buttons and the stroller only comes in black I really wanted it in maybe red and grey or navy and baby blue .but besides those 2 things its a beautiful stroller and i get alot of compliments

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: It’s an okay stroller but for the price you really should have better storage than a cheap plastic bin. Cup holder is flimsy and takes up a lot of space in the trunk.
